username.description: Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

controller.description: IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

http_method.description: Allowed HTTP methods for RESTful services and are supported by Avi Controller.

params.description: Query parameters passed to the HTTP API.

tenant.description: Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

timeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) for Avi API calls.

path.description: Path for Avi API resource. For example, C(path: virtualservice) will translate to C(api/virtualserivce).

password.description: Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

data.description: HTTP body in YAML or JSON format.

tenant_uuid.description: UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

api_version.description: Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
